import React from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import { useForm } from "react-hook-form"; function EmployeeForm(props) { const {title} = props const { register, handleSubmit } = useForm() const onSubmit = data => console.log(data); return (
{title}
Full Name
Gender
Marital Status
Birthday
Phone Number
Email Address
Employee Type
Join Date
Employee Type
) } EmployeeForm.propTypes = { title: PropTypes.string, employee: PropTypes.object, listEmp: PropTypes.array.isRequired, } EmployeeForm.defaultProps = { title: 'Add New Employee', employee: {}, list: [], } export default EmployeeForm
